ComicInfo.Summary: KAPTARA's secrets lie within the spooky HOLLOW PALACE! Weird name for a place that actually contains something important? Anyway, our heroes make the treacherous journey alongside nefarious frenemies! Can they survive what's waiting for them? The award-hoping series from CHIP "BATMAN" ZDARSKY and KAGAN "SHE-HULK END CREDITS" McLEOD continues!
